text: Melissa Bettoni (; born 7 May 1991 in Borgosesia) is an Italian rugby union player. She participated at the 2011 Women's Rugby European championship, 2014 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2018 Women's Six Nations Championship, and 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup. She played for Rennes. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian rugby union players Category:Rugby sevens players
title: Melissa Bettoni
